articles.title: Billionaire no more: Patagonia founder gives away the company - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Rather than selling the company or taking it public, Yvon Chouinard, his wife and two adult children have transferred their ownership of Patagonia, valued at about $3 billion, to a specially designed trust and a non-profit organization
